verses.verse: <S%G5279>Put<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> in <S%G5279>mind<s%> to be subject <S%G5293>to<s%> <S%G746>principalities<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1849>powers<s%>, to obey <S%G3980>magistrates<s%>, to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%>,

To speak <S%G987>evil<s%> of no <S%G3367>man<s%>, to <S%G1511>be<s%> no <S%G269>brawlers<s%>, but <S%G1933>gentle<s%>, <S%G1731>showing<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4236>meekness<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>.

<S%G3756>Not<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G4160>done<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> he <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>, <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3067>washing<s%> of <S%G3824>regeneration<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G342>renewing<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>;

<S%G2443>That<s%> being <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G1565>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>, we should be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.

This is a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> these <S%G5130>things<s%> I <S%G1014>will<s%> <S%G1226>that<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> affirm <S%G1226>constantly<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they which have <S%G4100>believed<s%> in <S%G2316>God<s%> might be <S%G5431>careful<s%> to <S%G4291>maintain<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>. These <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5624>profitable<s%> unto <S%G444>men<s%>.
<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he that is <S%G5108>such<s%> is <S%G1612>subverted<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G264>sins<s%>, <S%G5607>being<s%> condemned of <S%G843>himself<s%>.

<S%G3752>When<s%> I shall <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G734>Artemas<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%>, be <S%G4704>diligent<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3533>Nicopolis<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I have <S%G2919>determined<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> to <S%G3914>winter<s%>.

All that <S%G3956>are<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G782>greet<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%>. <S%G782>Greet<s%> them that <S%G5368>love<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>. <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>. It was written to Titus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Cretians, from Nicopolis of Macedonia.
